title: "Apple's Product Design Chief Is Leaving To Make AI Products With Jony Ive"
excerpt: "Apple’s product design chief is leaving the company to work with former Apple designer Jony Ive. Outgoing Apple executive Tang Tan will reportedly be joining Ive’s design firm LoveFrom to help work on a new artificial intelligence hardware project backed by OpenAI’s Sam Altman, Bloomberg reports."
